front.title: Virtual Private Wire Service support in Ethernet VPN

abstract.t: This document describes how Ethernet VPN (EVPN) can be used to support Virtual Private Wire Service (VPWS) in MPLS/IP networks. EVPN enables the following characteristics for VPWS: single-active as well as all-active multi-homing with flow-based load-balancing, eliminates the need for Pseudowire (PW) signaling, and provides fast protection convergence upon node or link failure.
